QueryDefinition.Query:
with map as ( select 'aducanumab' drug_name, 1537087 concept_id union select 'aduhelm' drug_name, 1537087 concept_id union select 'aricept' drug_name, 715997 concept_id union select 'brexpiprazole' drug_name, 46275300 concept_id union select 'donanemab' drug_name, 1734796 concept_id union select 'donepezil' drug_name, 715997 concept_id union select 'donepezil / memantine' drug_name, 715997 concept_id union select 'donepezil / memantine' drug_name, 701322 concept_id union select 'exelon' drug_name, 733523 concept_id union select 'galantamine' drug_name, 757627 concept_id union select 'gantenerumab' drug_name, 36851650 concept_id union select 'kisunla' drug_name, 1734796 concept_id union select 'lecanemab' drug_name, 1301377 concept_id union select 'leqembi' drug_name, 1301377 concept_id union select 'memantine' drug_name, 701322 concept_id union select 'namenda' drug_name, 701322 concept_id union select 'namzaric' drug_name, 715997 concept_id union select 'namzaric' drug_name, 701322 concept_id union select 'razadyne' drug_name, 757627 concept_id union select 'rexulti' drug_name, 46275300 concept_id union select 'risvastigmine' drug_name, 733523 concept_id )
select distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, encid, drug as source_value, encounterdate, 32858 type_concept_id, 0 source_concept_id, map.concept_id FROM {sc}.alz_medication l JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND l.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE LEFT JOIN map on l.drug = map.drug_name order by 1
